Bossier_City.Huey P. Long House (Laurel St., Shrevepo:
Huey P. Long House is a historic house located at 2403 Laurel Street in Shreveport, Louisiana was built in c.1905. It was listed on the NRHP in 1991 and it was delisted on May 2, 2016.


== Description and history ==
It was built around 1905 and was a modest one-story Queen Anne house with Colonial Revival columns.
